articles.author: Nathaniel Meyersohn, CNN Business
articles.title: Amazon plans to hire 150,000 temporary workers for the holidays - CNN
articles.description: Amazon plans to add 150,000 temporary workers in the United States for the holiday shopping rush, a 50% increase from the company's holiday hiring push a year ago.
